name: Bubble Pop - Yummy Crush Merge
description:
Play and enjoy the classic match 3 bubble shooter game with more than 55 puzzles. Just tap and tilt your way through over addictive and coloring bubble puzzles. Match at least 3 bubbles of the same color to pop the combination and solve all the bubble puzzles.

Features:

* More than 55 color levels to complete!
* Easy and fun to play but hard to master!
* Special Boosters to help you complete the levels!
* Smooth and simple controls
* Tap and tilt your way through the levels


How to play:

Tap and tilt where you want to shoot a group of 3 or more bubbles of the same colors. Clear all the bubbles on the top to collect stars in order to complete the levels.

It’s a classic bubble shooter experience you don’t want to miss! Download it today for FREE and become the bubble shooting champion!
